Name: Perfect Decision
About the game: 「Perfect decision」 is a strategic business simulation game based on real estate. In the game, you will play a real estate novice, inherit the will of a mediocre old man, and start a real estate business career full of various variables! At the beginning of the game, you will choose a character character, use a little money, go to different maps to prove your strength! The information in each game you start is random, so even if it's the same map, the content is different. Random cities, talents, real estate resources, social resources, emergencies, market development trends It is worth mentioning that although all real estate resources are random, their core (price) is not simply a random number, but determined by a series of factors (city, its various attributes, market environment, time, etc.)! You will create different types of companies, and use these companies' own operational means to make profits. This is also the foundation for your company to survive and expand. Thus, the distribution and characteristics of the city city group, and of course, the awesome employees will continue to grow your company size and finally get the recognition of all cities. When you focus on the development of the company, you need to deal with all kinds of controllable and uncontrollable good or bad things, to ensure that your company can continue to run! The game support the achievement system and ranking system. The ranking is based on the fund income per unit time (of course, the loan funds won't be included) to evaluate your ranking.
